caption.p: Box plot of COVID-19 incidence and mortality rate above quantile of PM10. (A) Relationship between quartiles of PM10 and COVID-19 incidence rate × 100,000. (B) Relationship between quartiles of PM10 and COVID-19 mortality rate × 100,000. The quartiles of PM10 are 1: [3.43–11.31 µg/m3); 2: [11.31–18.30 µg/m3); 3: [18.30–32.61 µg/m3); 4: [32.61–81.43 µg/m3].
